review_text:
Somehow, even compared to the massive disappointment that was _Jeepers Creepers 2_, this movie is still a letdown. If you're looking for an excuse to not give literal paedophile Victor Salva any of your your hard-earned money, here's one: _Jeepers Creepers 3_ fuckin' sucks.

_Final rating:★½: - Boring/disappointing. Avoid where possible._
